dialog: Hi Medi, I have a stomachache and bloating.
I am here to help you. Can you describe your symptoms more?
I feel discomfort and pain in my stomach and I feel bloated after eating.
You may have Irritable Bowel Syndrome(IBS).
What is IBS?

IBS is a functional gastrointestinal disorder characterised by abdominal pain and altered bowel habits in the absence of a specific and unique organic pathology. Stressful life events, dietary factors, and gut dysbiosis may contribute to the development of IBS.
What do I need to do now?
You should avoid foods that can trigger IBS symptoms. Also, you can try to reduce stress in your life.
Thanks, Medi. Do you have any advice on what to eat?

IBS is the most common functional gastrointestinal disorder, with a worldwide prevalence ranging from 1% to 45%.
